Key Match Events: Ibáñez's pinch-hit bases-clearing double off Josh Hader in the top of the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers' connection and togetherness made them like a band of brothers supporting one another and pushing for each other.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers ended the Astros' 47-game postseason winning streak when leading going into the eighth inning.
It was the Tigers' first go-ahead pinch-hit base hit in postseason history.
